{"id":359027050,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1593273939,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/359027050/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"14.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        if (height.size() == 0) {\n            return 0; \n        }\n        int n = height.size() - 1; \n        vector<int> pref(height.size(), 0); \n        vector<int> suff(height.size(), 0); \n        \n        pref[0] = height[0]; \n        suff[n] = height[n]; \n        \n        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {\n            pref[i] = max(pref[i - 1], height[i]); \n            suff[n - i] = max(suff[n - i + 1], height[n - i]); \n        }\n        int ans = 0; \n        for (int i = 1; i < height.size() - 1; ++i) {\n            ans += min(pref[i], suff[i]) - height[i]; \n        }\n        return ans; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
